mapper.insert: insert into t_evaluate (orderId, skuId, userId, evaluate, evaluateTime) values (#{orderId}, #{skuId}, #{userId}, #{evaluate}, #{evaluateTime})
mapper.select: select evaluate.*, t.val from t_evaluate as evaluate left join (select *, GROUP_CONCAT(value) as val from t_goods_pro_val GROUP BY skuid) as t on evaluate.skuid = t.skuid

select evaluate.*, t.val, sku.goodsid, user.name from t_evaluate as evaluate left join (select *, GROUP_CONCAT(value) as val from t_goods_pro_val GROUP BY skuid) as t on evaluate.skuid = t.skuid left join t_goods_sku as sku on evaluate.skuid = sku.id left join t_user as user on evaluate.userId = user.id where sku.goodsid = #{goodsId}
